metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of Early Paleozoic high Ba-Sr intrusions in the North Qinling block, China
metadata.titleCn: 中国北秦岭地块早古生代高Ba-Sr侵入体地球化学数据
metadata.description: The data are U-Pb dating data, mineral trace geochemical data, whole rock major trace geochemical data and isotopic geochemical data of high Ba SR intrusives. Samples were collected from quartz diorite and diorite of high Ba SR intrusion in North Qinling block. The U-Pb isotopic data of zircon were obtained by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The major and trace geochemical data of the whole rock were obtained by X-ray fluorescence spectrometry and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The whole rock isotopic geochemical data were obtained by multi receiver inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The obtained data can reveal the petrogenesis of different high Ba SR intrusions and limit the formation time of corresponding tectonic settings.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为高Ba-Sr侵入体放射性同位素U -Pb测年数据，矿物微量地球化学数据，全岩主微量地球化学数据和同位素地球化学数据。样品采集自北秦岭地块高Ba-Sr侵入体的石英闪长岩和闪长岩。放射性同位素年代学数据和矿物微量地球化学数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析锆石U-Pb同位素获得。岩石全岩主微量地球化学数据通过X荧光光谱仪和电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得。全岩同位素地球化学数据通过多接收-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得。通过获得的数据，可以揭示不同高Ba-Sr侵入体岩石成因，限定相应构造背景形成时限。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file. The name of the file "UPB" represents radioisotope data. The name of the file "wrmajtra" represents the major and trace geochemical data of the whole rock. The name of the file "WR isotopic" represents the whole rock SR – nd – Hf isotopic data. The file name "zircon tra" represents zircon trace element data.
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储。文件名称为"UPb "代表放射性同位素数据。文件名称为“WRMajTra”代表全岩主微量地球化学数据。文件名称为“WR isotopic”代表全岩Sr–Nd–Hf同位素数据。文件名称为“ZirconTra”代表锆石微量元素数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific attributes of high Ba-Sr intrusions measured using geochemical methods?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用地球化学方法测量的高钡-锶侵入体的具体属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: radiogenic isotope U-Pb dating, mineral trace geochemical data, whole-rock major and trace geochemical data, whole-rock isotopic geochemical data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 放射性同位素铀-铅定年，矿物微量地球化学数据，整体岩石主要和微量地球化学数据，整体岩石同位素地球化学数据。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many types of geochemical data are included in a dataset focused on early Paleozoic high Ba-Sr intrusions in the North Qinling Block?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 一个专注于北秦岭块早期古生代高钡-锶侵入体的数据集中包含多少种地球化学数据类型？

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What geological processes might be inferred from the geochemical data patterns observed in high Ba-Sr intrusive rocks, and how might these insights inform our understanding of the tectonic history of the North Qinling terrane?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从高Ba-Sr侵入岩的地球化学数据模式中可以推断出哪些地质过程，这些见解又如何帮助我们理解北秦岭地块的构造历史？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The geochemical data from high Ba-Sr intrusive rocks, including isotopic data such as U-Pb zircon dating and whole-rock geochemistry, can provide insights into the origin of these rocks and their tectonic setting. By analyzing the isotopic and geochemical signatures, researchers can infer the processes that led to the formation of the intrusive bodies, such as magma source characteristics and differentiation processes. This, in turn, can help to constrain the timing and nature of tectonic events that influenced the formation of the North Qinling terrane.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 高Ba-Sr侵入岩的地球化学数据，包括U-Pb锆石定年和全岩地球化学等同位素数据，可以提供关于这些岩石起源和构造背景的见解。通过分析同位素和地球化学特征，研究人员可以推断出导致侵入体形成的过程，例如岩浆源特征和分异过程。这反过来又有助于限制影响北秦岭地体形成的构造事件的时间和性质。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the choice of analytical techniques such as laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry and X-ray fluorescence spectrometry in the collection of geochemical data from high Ba-Sr intrusive rocks in the North Qinling terrane?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响选择分析技术的因素，如激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法和X射线荧光光谱法，以收集来自北秦岭地块的高Ba-Sr侵入岩的地球化学数据的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of analytical techniques like laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) and X-ray fluorescence spectrometry (XRF) is driven by the need for precise isotopic dating and detailed geochemical analysis of mineral and whole-rock samples. LA-ICP-MS is used for zircon U-Pb isotope analysis due to its ability to provide high-resolution age data essential for understanding the formation and tectonic history of high Ba-Sr intrusive rocks. XRF and ICP-MS are chosen for whole-rock major and trace element geochemistry to comprehensively characterize the composition and genesis of these rocks. These methods are selected for their accuracy, sensitivity, and ability to analyze a wide range of elements critical for geochemical characterization.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 选择激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）和X射线荧光光谱（XRF）等分析技术是为了满足对矿物和全岩样品进行精确同位素定年和详细地球化学分析的需求。LA-ICP-MS用于锆石U-Pb同位素分析，因为它能够提供高分辨率的年龄数据，这对于理解高Ba-Sr侵入岩的形成和构造历史至关重要。XRF和ICP-MS则用于全岩主要和微量元素的地球化学分析，以全面表征这些岩石的成分和成因。这些方法因其准确性、灵敏度以及能够分析广泛元素的能力而被选中，这些元素对于地球化学特征化至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for zircon U-Pb isotopic analysis on the precision and accuracy of geochronological data in studying Early Paleozoic high Ba-Sr intrusions in the North Qinling Block?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用激光烧蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法进行锆石U-Pb同位素分析对研究北秦岭块体早古生代高Ba-Sr侵入体的地质年代数据的精度和准确性可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for zircon U-Pb isotopic analysis can lead to high precision and accuracy in geochronological data, which is crucial for determining the formation timing and tectonic settings of high Ba-Sr intrusions. This method allows for detailed age dating and helps in understanding the petrogenesis of the rocks, providing insights into the geological history and processes that formed these intrusions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 激光烧蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法用于锆石U-Pb同位素分析，可以在地质年代学数据中实现高精度和高准确性，这对于确定高Ba-Sr侵入体的形成时间和构造背景至关重要。这种方法允许进行详细的年龄测定，有助于理解岩石的成因，为了解这些侵入体形成的地质历史和过程提供了深入的见解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose behind collecting and analyzing geochemical data for high Ba-Sr intrusive bodies in the early Paleozoic era of the North Qinling block?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集和分析北秦岭块早古生代高Ba-Sr侵入体的地球化学数据的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The purpose of collecting and analyzing geochemical data for high Ba-Sr intrusive bodies in the early Paleozoic era of the North Qinling block is to reveal the genesis of different high Ba-Sr intrusive rocks and to define the timing of formation within their respective tectonic settings. This is achieved through U-Pb isotopic dating, mineral trace geochemistry, whole-rock major and trace geochemistry, and isotopic geochemistry using various analytical techniques.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集和分析北秦岭块体早古生代高Ba-Sr侵入体的地球化学数据的目的是揭示不同高Ba-Sr侵入岩的成因，并确定它们在各自构造背景下的形成时间。这是通过U-Pb同位素定年、矿物微量元素地球化学、全岩主量和微量元素地球化学以及同位素地球化学等多种分析技术实现的。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental methodologies are employed to accurately determine zircon U-Pb isotopic ages in the context of geochemical data collection for early Paleozoic high Ba-Sr intrusions in the North Qinling terrane?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在北秦岭地块早古生代高Ba-Sr侵入体的地球化学数据收集过程中，采用了哪些仪器方法来准确确定锆石U-Pb同位素年龄？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Zircon U-Pb isotopic ages are determined using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) to analyze zircon samples from high Ba-Sr intrusions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb同位素年龄通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）分析来自高Ba-Sr侵入体的锆石样品来确定。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the precise analysis of zircon U-Pb isotopes for determining the age of high Ba-Sr intrusive rocks?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得对锆石U-Pb同位素的精确分析成为可能，从而确定高钡-锶侵入岩的年龄？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The precise analysis of zircon U-Pb isotopes for age determination is enabled by the use of laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS).
Enablement.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb同位素的精确分析通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）实现，以进行年龄测定。
